designations.source: The Vascular Plant Red Data List for Great Britain, revised February 2019
designations.source_description: Leach, S.J. 2019 (in prep) The Vascular Plant Red Data List for Great Britain: a summary of amendments in years 12 and 13 (2017-2018) of the annual amendments process. BSBI News 141
designations.reporting_category: Red listing based on 2001 IUCN guidelines
designations.designation_description: A taxon is Critically Endangered when it is facing an extremely high risk of extinction in the wild in the immediate future, as defined by any of the criteria A to E.
designations.comments: Previously named as a hybrid, but now recognised as a species by Sell & Murrell (2014) and Rich (pers. comm. Oct 2016)
